articles.title: How animals are evolving to survive in the age of wildfires - The Washington Post
articles.description: Animals have long learned to live alongside wildfires, but those coping skills are being tested as Earth enters the Pyrocene.
articles.content: Return to menuThis Australian animal has also evolved to flee from fires. But instead of going underground like the antechinus, this reptile goes up, using tree perches to get away from modest fires … [+845 chars]
